name: Priest, heal!
description:
Priest, heal is a short game about those who stand in back rows and protect people we love, we adore, and we admire.

Use WASD or arrow keys to move your priest. Use the left mouse button to heal your knights by clicking on them. Alive knights equal dead skeletons. You, can't attack, so keep an eye on your buddies.

Assets by

  • Models "Hobby Set" by Greebles <greebles.itch.io/discount-dungeon>
  • Font "Retro Gaming" by Daymarius <dafont.com/retro-gaming.font>
  • Arcade Sound Effects by Agent Slimepunk <agentslimepunk.itch.io/arcade-sound-fx>
  • Fuse - Retro Fusion Music Loops by Ben Arntz, @beepartz <beepartz.itch.io/fuse-retro-fusion-music-loops>

Also, huge thanks to GDQuest.com for tutorials!

Thanks for playing!
